summary: Wind power... It's green... It's good... Or is it? Windfall exposes the dark side of wind energy development when the residents of a rural upstate New York town consider going green.
cast: Scott Alexander|Frank Bachler|Ron Bailey|Sue Bailey|John Barrasso|Rick Beyer|Dan Birnbaum|Keitha Capouya|Chuck Coggins|Tara Collins|John Hamilton|Roger Hamilton|Tom Hewson|Ken Jaffe|Andy Karsner|Eve Kelley|Steve McCarthy|Paul Menke|Rosemary Nichols|T. Boone Pickens|Rachel Polens|Harry Reid|Marge Rockefeller|Bob Rosen|Bernie Sanders|Mark Schneider|Charlie Smith|Carol Spinelli|Eric Weidemeyer|Gordon Yancey
title: Windfall
